creator: linamaes
sql: SELECT PRINTF('%04d-%02d', "year", "month") AS yearMonth, GBIF_EQDGCCode(1, decimalLatitude, decimalLongitude, COALESCE(coordinateUncertaintyInMeters, 10000)) AS CellCode, basisOfRecord, datasetKey, countryCode, speciesKey, species, family, class, COUNT(*) AS occurrences FROM occurrence WHERE occurrenceStatus = 'PRESENT' AND speciesKey IN (2442447) AND hasCoordinate = TRUE AND (coordinateUncertaintyInMeters <= 10000 OR coordinateUncertaintyInMeters IS NULL) AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'ZERO_COORDINATE') AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COORDINATE_OUT_OF_RANGE') AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COORDINATE_INVALID') AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COUNTRY_COORDINATE_MISMATCH') AND "month" IS NOT NULL GROUP BY yearMonth, CellCode, basisOfRecord, datasetKey, countryCode, speciesKey, species, family, class ORDER BY yearMonth DESC, CellCode ASC, countryCode ASC
